itemDescription: Welsh rugby league footballer and rugby union coach (b. 1973)

wikipedia_page.main: Gareth Davies (born 7 August 1973) is a Welsh physical education teacher, former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1990s, and rugby union coach. He played representative level rugby league (RL) for Wales, and at club level for Warrington (Heritage No. 931), as a fullback, centre, second-row or loose forward, and coaches college level rugby union (RU) for St Edward's College, Liverpool.
